latest_changelog.zh_cn:
- **修复幽灵矿车问题，如果殖民地中有铁路建议更新到此版本，可以避免每次重启时在服务端堆积不可见矿车**
- **修复不合理的寻路起点选取，这将修复前几个版本中某些特定地形的寻路AI卡死的问题**
- 水路启发值修改，市民将更不喜欢走水路
- 其他不重要的修改 
- 详情见CurseForge/Modrinth更新日志
latest_changelog.en_us:
- **Fixed ghost minecart issue** — if your colony uses rails, it’s strongly recommended to update to this version to prevent invisible minecarts from stacking on the server after each restart.  
- **Fixed invalid pathfinding start point selection**, which could cause AI to get stuck on certain terrain types in previous versions.  
- Adjusted water pathfinding heuristic — citizens will now prefer to avoid water routes.  
- Minor tweaks and optimizations.  
- See full details in the CurseForge/Modrinth changelog.

latest_stable_changelog.zh_cn:
- 寻路/矿车 bug 修复
 - 下界矿工逻辑修改
 - 混凝土工人逻辑修改
 - 水田兼容 (需要自行添加Tag)
 - 进食策略修改与 bug 修复
 - 补充市民职业/全局AI的nbt
 - 详情请见 Mod 个人主页 source 中的 changelog.md
latest_stable_changelog.en_us:
- Fixed pathfinding/minecart bugs  
- Updated Nether miner logic  
- Updated concrete worker logic  
- Added farmland compatibility (requires custom Tag) 
- Updated eating strategy and fixed related bugs  
- Added NBT data for citizen jobs and global AI  
- See changelog.md in the mod homepage source for details
